text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Zlín Region | native_name = Zlínský kraj | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = FrancovaLhota vyhled.jpg | image_flag = Flag of Zlin Region.svg | flag_size = | image_shield = Zlin Region CoA CZ.svg | shield_size = | image_map = Zlínský kraj in Czech Republic.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Czech Republic | seat_type = Capital | seat = Zlín | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = (KDU-ČSL) | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 3963.55 | elevation_m = | elevation_max_m = 1206 | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 582921 | population_as_of = 2019-01-01 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = CZ-ZL | registration_plate = Z | website = www.kr-zlinsky.cz }} Zlín Region is an administrative unit (kraj) of the Czech Republic. The capital city is Zlín. ==Administrative divisions== The Zlín Region is divided into 4 districts: ==Places of interest== *Buchlov *Holešov with its museum of Jewish culture *Kroměříž Archbishop's Palace *Spa Luhačovice ==References== Category:2000 establishments in Europe
title: Zlín Region
